name: swathe
description: Swathe - Data Binding | No Dirty Checks | No Virtual DOM | Powerful | Small

scripts.swathe: muleify pack src dist && muleify pack src/swathe.b.js dist/swathe.min.js -m
scripts.site: rm -r docs/* && muleify pack site/src docs/.
scripts.dev: muleify pack src dist && cp dist/swathe.js site/src/. &&  muleify serve site/src site/dist

author: Alexander Elias
